ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Connection_zone is a type of . A Connection_zone is an area on the surface of a design object that may be used to establish electrical or physical connectivity with another design object. A Connection_zone shape is defined in the shape definition of the feature that references the Connection_zone. Since more than one feature may reference the same shape but for different positions, more than one feature may reference the same Connection_zone.
All points in a Connection_zone shall be topologically connected.
A Connection_zone shall be referenced by a feature at least once.
A particular instance of Connection_zone shall be referenced by exactly one shape instantiation.
